question: What is Machine Learning primarily concerned with?

What is overfitting in machine learning?
options: Model performs poorly on training data
Model performs well on both training and test data
Model performs too well on training data but poorly on test data
answer: Model performs too well on training data but poorly on test data

options: To display predicted vs actual classifications
answer: To display predicted vs actual classifications
